description: ## Overview Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Out-of-bounds Read via the handling of a ND Redirect message with truncated options. An attacker can read sensitive information from memory locations that may contain data from previous processes or kernel memory by sending a specially crafted ND Redirect message. ## Remediation There is no fixed version for `tianocore/edk2`. ## References - [Additional Information](https://blog.quarkslab.com/pixiefail-nine-vulnerabilities-in-tianocores-edk-ii-ipv6-network-stack.html) - [RedHat Bugzilla Bug](https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2258688)
remediation: There is no fixed version for tianocore/edk2 .
title: Out-of-bounds Read

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Out-of-bounds Read via the handling of a ND Redirect message with truncated options. An attacker can read sensitive information from memory locations that may contain data from previous processes or kernel memory by sending a specially crafted ND Redirect message.
